options.Show With Mouse Over: display when user mouses over an edge.

options.Detected: be automatically detected and set to small, medium, or large, based on the browser window.
options.Small: be set to small, unless this was the size automatically detected.
options.Medium: be set to medium, unless this was the size automatically detected.
options.Large: be set to large, unless this was the size automatically detected

options.Unchecked: be allowed to be past the viewport

title: Sliders

options.Link Distance Increase: edges should visibly decrease in length
options.Link Distance Decrease: edges should visibly increase in length
options.Charge Increase: nodes should visibly increase attraction with each other
options.Charge Decrease: nodes should visibly decrease attraction with each other
options.Charge Distance Increase: nodes should visibly increase charge distance
options.Charge Distance Decrease: nodes should visibly decrease charge distance

conditional: if Lock Force Graph Parameters is unchecked.
